ModMetaData.name: Star Wars Races
ModMetaData.author: Foggy Morning
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Wookie, Rodian and Twi'lek races. Adds all three races to the PlayerColony and PlayerTribe factions. Does not add any additional factions. Includes new hats for Twi'leks only. Adds a Wookie bandolier as well. See the attached images. Should be compatible with other existing Star Wars mods that use the PlayerColony and PlayerTribe factions.
